name: Puzzle K
directions:
Each word below matches at least two numbered clues. The number next to each word is the total of all of the clues to that word.

For example, it clues 1 and 4 describe the same word, that word will appear next to the number 5.

After you have filled in all the words, read down the column of letters to get the solution.

clues.clue: Give as judged due or on the basis of merit
